item.title: From the Diary
item.description: Writing - Cathartic. Soothing. Heals. The Pen is a mighty one. Enemies all around. Spiritual, having human form. Weakness swallows the spirit. Things not as pure. Poison flooding the street. In need of collective rage. Rage against anything against what we stand for. Anything unnatural. All temptations are puny. Action. Action. Action. No man left behind. All towards the light at the end of the tunnel.
